description: This file contains utility functions for managing environment variable mappings between a set of common environment variables and framework-specific env files using YAML templates. It includes functions for obtaining template paths, parsing templates, applying prefixes, and mapping environment variables in both directions (common to framework-specific and vice versa). It also detects available frameworks based on directory contents.

methods.name: Path get_template_path(framework: str)
methods.description: Returns the file path to the environment template for a given framework.

methods.name: Tuple[Optional[str],Dict[str,str]] parse_template_file(template_path: Path)
methods.description: Parses a YAML template file to extract optional prefix and the env variable mapping.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] apply_prefix_mapping(common_env: Dict[str, str], prefix: str)
methods.description: Adds a prefix to all environment variables in the provided dictionary.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] map_common_to_framework(framework: str, common_env: Dict[str, str])
methods.description: Maps a set of common environment variables to framework-specific environment variables based on a template.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] map_framework_to_common(framework: str, framework_env: Dict[str, str])
methods.description: Maps framework-specific environment variables back to a set of common variables based on a template.

methods.name: list get_supported_frameworks()
methods.description: Detects available frameworks by checking for directories containing an environment template.

ctags.name: apply_prefix_mapping
ctags.pattern: /^def apply_prefix_mapping(common_env: Dict[str, str], prefix: str) -> Dict[str, str]:$/

ctags.name: map_common_to_framework
ctags.pattern: /^def map_common_to_framework(framework: str, common_env: Dict[str, str]) -> Dict[str, str]:$/

ctags.name: map_framework_to_common
ctags.pattern: /^def map_framework_to_common(framework: str, framework_env: Dict[str, str]) -> Dict[str, str]:$/
